plan.field: The release plan specifies which Work Items are going to be implemented for each system release and dates for those releases. These selected Work Items are then translated into individual tasks to be implemented during the iteration to complete the Work Items.

@current iteration true

<h2>Plan Status - $plan.fields.status.render.withIcon(false)</h2>
@current true true 80%
@current day 1 80%

Statistics

#set($scope = "$plan.reference.projectId") #if(!$plan.fields.projectSpan.isEmpty()) #if($plan.fields.projectSpan.size()>0) #set($pSpan = $plan.fields.projectSpan.iterator.next) #set($scope = "$pSpan.reference.projectId") #end #end #set($topLevelWiType = "") #if($plan.fields.allowedTypes.isEmpty()) #warning("Statistics cannot be displayed, because no allowed type is configured.") #else #if($plan.fields.allowedTypes.size()>0) ## How statuses for the first configured type in the Statistics #set($topLevelWiType = $plan.fields.allowedTypes.iterator.next.id) #end ## #set($stats = $plan.statistics()) #set($planQuery=$pageContext.planQuery) ## #macro(statusIcon $type $status)<img src="$trackerService.dataService.getEnumerationForKey("WorkItem", "status", $trackerService.getTrackerProject("$scope").contextId).wrapOption("$status", $type).getProperty("iconURL")"/>#end #macro(tableLine $label $value)<tr><td nowrap align=right style="width:120px">$label:</td><td nowrap align=left style="padding-left:5px;font-weight:bold"> $value </td></tr>#end #macro(count $q) <b><span class="polarion-rp-inline-widget" data-widget="com.polarion.countOfObjects"> <span class="polarion-rp-widget-parameters"> <sub id="dataSet"> <sub id="scope">$scope</sub> <sub id="prototype">WorkItem</sub> <sub id="queryType">lucene</sub> <sub id="luceneQuery">$q</sub> </sub> <sub id="before"></sub><sub id="after"></sub> </span> </span></b> #end ## <style> .statistics a{ font-weight:bold !important; font-size:14px; color:black !important; padding-left:5px; padding-right:2px; } </style> <table style="line-height: 2;" class="statistics"> <tr> <td width=200> <div class="polarion-rp-widget-part" data-widget="com.polarion.separateByPieChart"> <span class="polarion-rp-widget-parameters"> <sub id="title"></sub> <sub id="dataSet"> <sub id="scope">$scope</sub> <sub id="prototype">WorkItem</sub> <sub id="subtype">$topLevelWiType</sub> <sub id="queryType">lucene</sub> <sub id="luceneQuery">$pageContext.planQuery</sub> <sub id="children"> <sub id="separateBy"> <sub id="field">status</sub> </sub> </sub> </sub> <sub id="showDataLabels">false</sub> <sub id="showZeroValues">false</sub> <sub id="advanced"> <sub id="height">150px</sub> <sub id="width">150px</sub> </sub> </span> </div> </td> <td style="vertical-align:top"> #count("$planQuery") Planned Work Items </br> #set($statuses = $transaction.enumerations.getEnumeration("status").forType("$topLevelWiType").forProject($scope).options) #foreach($status in $statuses)        #statusIcon("$topLevelWiType" "$status.id") #count("status:$status.id AND $planQuery") $status.label <br> #end </td> <td style="vertical-align:top"> <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"> #tableLine("Start Date" "$!plan.fields.startDate.render") #tableLine("End Date" "$!plan.fields.dueDate.render") #tableLine("Remaining Done" "$stats.todoAsString()") #tableLine("Work Done" "$stats.doneAsString() ($stats.progressAsString())") #tableLine("Ideal Progress" "$stats.idealProgressAsString()") #tableLine("Total Work" "$stats.plannedAsString()") </table> </td> </tr></table> #end

Child Plans

Plan luceneVelocity parent.id:$plan.reference.id name status _progress dueDate false 50

Planned Items

#if(!$widgetContext.target.pdf) <style> .plan-links{ padding-bottom:5px; } .plan-links > a { padding-left:5px; padding-right:5px; font-weight:bold; } </style> <div class="plan-links"> <a target="_top" href="$plan.utils.prioritizationLink"> <img src="/polarion/icons/default/actions/prioritizePlan.png"/> Prioritize Planned Items</a> ## See Page Script for definition of links <a target="_top" href="$pageContext.addWorkItemsLink"> <img src="/polarion/icons/default/actions/create_link.gif"/> Add Work Items to the Plan</a> <a target="_top" href="$pageContext.browseAllPlannedLink"> <img src="/polarion/icons/default/actions/openInTable.png"/> Browse All Planned Items</a> </div> #end ## The table is scripted, as we need the scope and columns to be derived from the Plan properties ## See Page Script <div class="polarion-rp-widget-part" data-widget="com.polarion.table"> <span class="polarion-rp-widget-parameters"> <sub id="dataSet"> <sub id="scope">$pageContext.scope</sub> <sub id="prototype">WorkItem</sub> <sub id="queryType">lucene</sub> <sub id="luceneQuery">$pageContext.planQuery</sub> <sub id="children"> <sub id="columns"> <sub> <sub id="id">id</sub> </sub> <sub> <sub id="id">title</sub> </sub> <sub> <sub id="id">status</sub> </sub> <sub> <sub id="id">$plan.fields.prioritizationField.get</sub> </sub> #if($plan.fields.calculationType.optionId == "timeBased") <sub> <sub id="id">initialEstimate</sub> </sub> <sub> <sub id="id">remainingEstimate</sub> </sub> <sub> <sub id="id">timeSpent</sub> </sub> #else <sub> <sub id="id">$plan.fields.estimationField.get</sub> </sub> #end </sub> <sub id="sortBy"> <sub> <sub id="id">$pageContext.prioritizationField</sub> <sub id="descending">true</sub> </sub> </sub> </sub> <sub id="advanced"> <sub id="top">50</sub> </sub> </span> </div>

Issues for Release

Issues that should be fixed in $plan.label . Issues are not calculated in the Release Plan estimate. To plan the issue, just set a Target Version field.

WorkItem issue luceneVelocity targetVersion.KEY:$plan.fields.id.get id title status priority severity priority true severity true created true 50

## ## Hints Panel ## <style> .hints-panel{ padding: 20px; border-radius: 5px; text-align:left; background-color:rgb(189,237,228); color:rgb(64,157,139) !important; padding-bottom:15px; padding-top:10px; line-height:25px; margin-top:20px } .hints-panel a{ color:rgb(64,157,139) !important; } </style> #if(!$plan.fields.dueDate.get || !$plan.fields.startDate.get || $plan.items.isEmpty) <div class="hints-panel"> <span style="font-size:14px;font-weight:bold;">Next Steps<br/></span> #if(!$plan.fields.dueDate.get || !$plan.fields.startDate.get) <span style="font-size:25px;font-weight:bold">☐</span> <a style="color:rgb(64,157,139)" target="_top" href="/polarion/#/project/$plan.reference.projectId/plan?id=$plan.reference.id&tab=properties"> Set <b>Start</b> and <b>Due</b> Date. </a><br/> #end #if($plan.items.isEmpty) <span style="font-size:25px;font-weight:bold">☐</span> <a style="color:rgb(64,157,139)" target="_top" href="$pageContext.addWorkItemsLink"> <b>Add</b> Work Items to the Plan. </a><br/> #end </div> #end

<style> .plan-bluepanel{ background-color: #edf6ff; padding: 20px; border-radius: 5px; margin: auto; text-align:left } </style> <div class="plan-bluepanel"> <div style="text-align: center;"><span class="polarion-rp-inline-widget" data-widget="com.polarion.planOpenInTableButton" polarion-inline-block-widget="true"></span></div> <br/> <a target="_top" href="$pageContext.addWorkItemsLink"> <span style=";padding-left:23px;font-size:14px;line-height:30px;font-weight:bold;"> <img src="/polarion/icons/default/actions/create_link.gif"/> Add Work Items to the Plan </span> </a> <ul> <li> <a target="_top" href="$plan.utils.prioritizationLink"> Prioritize Planned Items </a> </li> <li> <a target="_top" href="$pageContext.browseAllPlannedLink"> Browse All Planned Items </a> </li> </ul> </div>
